English: <s>The first and only reserve in Scotland dedicated to the Scottish crossbill has been created at Threave Estate, Dumfries and Galloway, which is the stronghold of the two Scottish crossbills.</s>
The Scottish crossbill is a small finch-like bird that is endemic to Scotland. It is a member of the finch family, the Fringillidae, and is closely related to the common crossbill. It is a rare bird, with a population of around 1000 birds in the wild. The Scottish crossbill is a threatened species, with its numbers having declined by around 50% in the last 20 years.

English: <s>20% of students say they have a “main” account that they show to their peers</s>
The Catalan version of the article is correct. The English version is not.
The Catalan version is correct because the verb “mostren” is in the subjunctive mood. The English version is not correct because the verb “show” is in the indicative mood.
The subjunctive mood is used to express a wish, a doubt, a hypothetical situation, or an indirect question.
The indicative mood is used to express a fact, a truth, a command, a promise, or a request.
The subjunctive mood is used in the following situations:
- To express a wish, a doubt, a hypothetical situation, or an indirect question.
- To express a fact, a truth, a command, a promise, or a request.
- To express a command.
- To express a request.
- To express a promise.
- To express a request.
- To express a request.
- To express a request.
- To express a request.
- To express a request.
- To express a request.
- To express a

She will succeed David Grevemberg, who is leaving the post after 10 years to take up a new role as Chief Executive of the International Association of Athletics Federations (IAAF).
Doyle, who is a former Scottish 400m champion, said: “I am delighted to be taking up the role of Chief Executive of Scottish Athletics.
“I am passionate about the sport and the role that athletics plays in the lives of so many people across Scotland.
“I am looking forward to working with the Board, staff and volunteers to build on the success of the last decade and to continue to grow the sport in Scotland.”

The quake struck at 6:47 a.m. local time (2247 GMT Saturday) and was centered 10 kilometers (6 miles) northwest of the town of Mataram, the capital of Lombok, according to the U.S. Geological Survey.
The quake was felt as far away as Bali, the neighboring island, and as far as the capital of Jakarta, 1,000 kilometers (620 miles) to the east.

Coastal flooding can occur during high tide or during a storm surge. Coastal flooding can be dangerous and can cause injury or death. If you are in an area that is prone to coastal flooding, move to higher ground immediately. If you are in a low-lying area, move to higher ground immediately.
